chapter.title: TestNG and TAP
chapter.para: TestNG was created by CÃ©dric Beust as test framework to fill the gaps left by JUnit. One of these gaps was extensibility. In tap4j there is a Listener responsible for creating a TAP Stream for a Test Result.

Say you have a test project with over two hundreds tests and would like to have your test results outputted in TAP. I you will have to do is add a listener to your suite of tests. Let's see some examples that may help making it clear.
